attributes.action: BURMA CRISIS - Provide and promote instant Aid to the people of Burma by forced means if necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE UK GOVERNMENT MUST TAKE IMMEDIATE ACTION TO GET SUPPLIES TO THE PEOPLE OF BURMA IGNORING OF THE VIEWS OF THE CONTROLLING JUNTA

JUST IMAGINE IT IS YOUR CHILD DYING IN FRONT OF YOUR EYES NOW!!!!
...AND IT APPEARS NOBODY CARES!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
